mapper.select: /* com.quiz.mapper.writingVoteDtlMapper.getWritingVoteDto */ SELECT WV.USER_ID , WV.WRITING_NO , WV.VOTE , W.FIR_VOTE_NO , W.SEC_VOTE_NO , ROUND((W.FIR_VOTE_NO/(W.FIR_VOTE_NO+W.SEC_VOTE_NO))*100) AS FIR_VOTE_PERC , ROUND((W.SEC_VOTE_NO/(W.FIR_VOTE_NO+W.SEC_VOTE_NO))*100) AS SEC_VOTE_PERC FROM WRITING_VOTE WV , WRITING W WHERE 1 = 1 AND WV.WRITING_NO = #{writing_no} AND WV.USER_ID = #{user_id} AND W.WRITING_NO = WV.WRITING_NO
/* com.quiz.mapper.writingVoteDtlMapper.insertWritingVoteDto */ INSERT INTO WRITING_VOTE VALUES(#{writing_no}, #{user_id}, #{vote}, #{user_id}, #{user_id}, now(), now())
